website_summaries.verdict: You'll find many uses for this classic gazebo, making it a notable value.
pros: Fuss-free design that's useful for various purposes including providing shelter on camping excursions and sun shade during trips to the beach
Can be used with or without the side curtains
cons: Material is fairly thin and has been reported to fade and develop loose stitching with regular use

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish for the price and wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Poles are too frail when they have to be forced in at stupid angles. Really isn't weatherproof a little bit of wind and the poles are almost breaking. Looks taller in advertised photos yet I can hardly open my hot tub within it
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Rider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sun cover with two sides to stop the breeze, easy to assemble and it can stand a thunderstorm and strong winds as I already had the pleasure of going through one.
customer_reviews.author: B Springer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions, but easy enough!
customer_reviews.text: No instructions were provided. Could be erected by two, but four preferable. The top ties for the sidewalks are poor. I have adapted these and the bottom elastic links to clip on and off with 24 small aluminium carabiners. Maybe velcro would have been better at the top edges. If you get the separate sidewall set too, there is no side with an opening or zip or flap. It does construct well with a bit of common sense, although we forgot the weatherproof clear flap at the apex, do had to top it on its side to attach the three hooks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shedden

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the family to visit . they had a picnic under it ,didn't take long to put up ..couple of days later the winds picked up we were a bit worried 40mph winds but we left it up coped well in the wind and rain just had to tighten the ropes up a couple of times but kept the rain and wind at bay a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Delboy

customer_reviews.title: It is not a bad gazebo
customer_reviews.text: To start with you might as well throw the instructions in the bin, they are totally useless, how difficult would it be for the seller to write some useful instructions and include them in the box? Providing you have a bit of common sense then you can have the thing up in about 20 minutes or so. It is quite sturdy but has not yet been subjected to wind or a big downfall of rain so I can't speak to how it would stand up to this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by the stain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for recent camping trip. Never used until trip last week. On putting up the canopy which was easy to do I discovered a stain on the inside of the canopy (first picture). This could not been seen from the outside (second picture), which I found strange. I can only assume that this product has either been an ex-display model or used before. I would urge anyone buying this product to assemble before use. I have missed the deadline to send back, but would like the supplier to acknowledge this review. As for the product itself is was good and easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Bought product less than six months ago, it has faded badly and the stitching has parted on three different seams, very dissapointed, would not reccomend buying.
customer_reviews.author: john marsden

customer_reviews.title: good recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good. stayed up through the store August 2020. made well. i did buy some different pegs as the ones it come with are not much good. no instructions in the bag. As long as you have put a tent up before your be fine. top tip put the rain cover shelf on first, I recon it will be much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun R.

customer_reviews.title: Good in sun., rain and wind
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. In the rain it provided an outdoor venue for my wife's crochet group. Social distancing was observed! In the sun my son had some friends round for a bbq. Again social distancing and bubbles were observed.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Really love the product served well on a camping trip very easy to erect great
customer_reviews.author: Ray Goode

product_meta.title: Brunner Medusa II Gazebo Outdoor3 X 3
product_meta.description: Outdoor gazebo with external poles made from steel and fiberglass. Eay to build up. Lightweight. Included two detachable polyester side walls.
feature_bullets: Supplied with two changeable side walls in polyester

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars34 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
